title: History
paragraphs: Onward has been in offshore compliance since 2010 so the progression to Authorized Service Provider for audits is a natural one.
Our team has a combined 300+ years of experience in the Oil and Gas Sector.

title: Understand
paragraphs: We differ from other audit providers as oil and gas is our specialty. Our team of qualified and competent auditors are oil and gas professionals first.

title: Work With Us
paragraphs: Audits can be viewed as a dreaded undertaking, costly and cumbersome. This is why itâ€™s crucial to choose an audit provider that truly understands your business and provides value.
